name: My Little Tornado
description:
A quick 2 weekend project to build a tornado diorama in Unity. Spawn tornadoes, crash them, watch them swoosh around junk. Made possible with Unitys new DOTS entity system. High End PC recommended...

Features a selection of interesting music from the Amiga Mod Archive.

Controls:
S - Spawns
D - Deletes
Arrows - Move Camera
